actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that the period of observance of daylight saving time each year shall begin on the last Sunday in March, rather than the last Sunday in April, and shall end on the last Sunday in November, rather than the last Sunday in October.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to extend the period of daylight saving time.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that the period of observance of daylight saving time each year shall begin on the last Sunday in March, rather than the last Sunday in April, and shall end on the last Sunday in November, rather than the last Sunday in October.
